ddns.desc: You can enable Dynamic DNS for this router and access this router remotely.
ddns.note: Note: You need an Internet Public IP address to use the Dynamic DNS. If this router is behind NAT, you may need to set up port forward in your ISP router.
ddns.behind_nat: But this router is behind NAT or you do not have a Public IP address.
ddns.not_effective: Your DDNS is not effective yet. Please try later.
ddns.enable_http_tip: HTTP is a non-encrypted protocol. Please use with caution.
